summary: A comprehensive Django test suite that verifies the correct behavior of many-to-many relationships across a wide range of operations, including adding, removing, assigning, clearing, bulk deletion, prefetching, forward and reverse accesses, queryset assignments, model inheritance cases, and handling of deprecation warnings.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the ORMâ€™s many-to-many handling to prevent regressions, ensure data integrity, and maintain compatibility with current and future Django releases.
